Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

hashtag#hiring *ACS- Software Developer/Engineer with Security Clearance*, Annapolis Junction, *United States*, $285K, fulltime hashtag#opentowork $285K hashtag#AnnapolisJunctionjobs hashtag#Marylandjobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/gri6mFGx Athenix Solutions Group is looking for Software Engineers in a variety of roles to develop, maintain, and enhance complex and diverse software systems assisting in the defense of our nation. We have roles for Engineers to work individually or as part of a team. Do you have skills and experience in some of the following areas? DevSecOps using modern tools like Gitlab Working in a Linux based development environment using tools like vscode Working on Linux based systems using Redhat, CentOS, Rocky, etc. Backend development and scripting of complex systems using languages like C++, Python, and JAVA Web-based user interface design and crafting an exciting user experience using Javascript, Vue.js, etc Building applications in a microservices architecture using Docker and Kubernetes Using databases and dealing with large datasets using MongoDB or SQL Participating in an Agile software development environment using a tracking system to manage your work Like Jira If so, we have an exciting job waiting for you! Minimum Requirements Active Clearance: TS/SCI with Polygraph is required Education: Positions available no matter where you are in your career! Entry Level - Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field, and no or minimal experience (Note: even without a degree, 4 years of relevant experience can qualify you for this level) Basic Level - Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field, and 4 years of relevant experience Mid-Level - Bachelor's degree in computer science, or related field, and 8 years of relevant experience Senior Level - Bachelor's degree in computer science, or related field, and 12 years of relevant experience Note: A Master's degree in computer science or relevant field can be used to substitute for 4 years of experience. Note: Additional years of experience may also be used in most cases as a substitute for the Bachelor's requirement Salary Range $69,000 - $285,000 USD Athenix Solutions Group, LLC and its companies Athenix Cyber and SIGINT, and Athenix Special Missions is an equal opportunity employer, including disability and protected veteran status.

🚀 ¡Estamos buscando a nuestro próximo Arquitecto/a de Soluciones IT! ¿Te apasiona diseñar arquitecturas en la nube escalables, resilientes y modernas? ¡Entonces queremos conocerte!👨‍💻 ¿Qué estamos buscando? Un profesional con sólida experiencia en Google Cloud Platform (GCP) y visión estratégica para liderar soluciones tecnológicas de alto impacto.🔍 Habilidades técnicas clave:☁️ Cloud & Arquitectura:Diseño e implementación de arquitecturas cloud (escalables y resilientes).Experiencia en migraciones a GCP.Dominio de servicios GCP: GKE, BigQuery, Cloud SQL, Pub/Sub, App Engine, etc.💻 Desarrollo & APIs:Lenguajes como Java, Python, Node.js.Microservicios, APIs REST/SOAP, wrappers, APIGEE.Buenas prácticas, patrones de diseño y control de versiones (Git).⚙️ DevOps & Automatización:CI/CD (Cloud Build, Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD).Infraestructura como código (Terraform, Deployment Manager).Contenedores: Docker & Kubernetes.Monitoreo y logging en la nube.🔐 Seguridad & Bases de Datos:Buenas prácticas en IAM, VPC, Cloud Armor.Diseño de bases de datos relacionales y no relacionales (BigQuery, Cloud SQL, Spanner).✨ Plus:Integración GCP con AWS o Azure.Experiencia liderando proyectos de migración a la nube.🧠 Habilidades blandas:Comunicación clara y efectiva.Colaboración en equipos multidisciplinarios.Mentalidad ágil.🕒 Horario: Lunes a viernes de 9:00 a 18:00 hrs. 🏠 Modalidad: Híbrida, con fuerte enfoque en Home Office.📩 Si estás listo para dar el siguiente paso en tu carrera, mándame un DM. ¡Nos encantaría conocerte!hashtag#Hiring hashtag#ArquitecturaCloud hashtag#GCP hashtag#DevOps hashtag#ITJobs hashtag#CloudComputing hashtag#TrabajoRemoto hashtag#TalentoTech

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge

Day 6🚀 The Resume Mistakes That Are Costing You Your Dream Job!So, you spent years learning to code, grinding Leetcode, and acing DSA… but your job applications are still getting ghosted? 👻Chances are, your resume is the problem (not you, my friend). Here are 3 common mistakes every engineer makes and how to fix them:🔴 1. "Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? 😂Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.🔴 2. "Worked on multiple projects using various technologies."Bhai, koi details toh de do!Fix: Be specific. Instead, write:"Built a hospital management system using MERN stack, handling 500+ patient requests daily."🔴 3. "Responsible for coding and testing software."That’s like saying "I drink water to stay hydrated." Not helping!Fix: Use action words:"Developed an automated testing framework, reducing bug reports by 30%."📌 Pro Tip: Recruiters spend less than 6 seconds scanning your resume. Make every word count! 🚀💬 Drop your resume in the comments if you want a quick review! Let’s help each other out.Novorésumé Overleaf Canva Rezi Kickresume resume.io hashtag#51LinkedInChallenge hashtag#Day6 hashtag#ResumeTips hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareEngineering hashtag#IndianEngineers hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#CareerGrowth hashtag#Hiring hashtag#Day6 hashtag#51DaysChallenge
